titleStmt.title: An answer at large, to a most hereticall, trayterous, and papisticall byll in English verse which was cast abrode in the streetes of Northamton, and brought before the judges at the last assizes there, 1570.
titleStmt.author: Knell, Thomas, fl. 1560-1581.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Tho. Knell Iu.
Reproduction of original in the St. John's College (University of Cambridge). Library.
